action.name: Open dropdown terminal here
action.description: Open dropdown terminal at current path

action.name: Open Terminal Here
action.description: Example for a custom action

action.name: Open Guake here
action.description: Open Guake at terminal path

action.name: Copy Current Path
action.description: Description: Copies $PATH to clipboard.

action.name: Slugify Filename
action.command: for file in %N; do mv "$file" "$(echo "$file" | tr -s ' ' | tr ' A-Z' '-a-z' | tr -s '-' | tr -c '[:alnum:][:cntrl:].' '_')"; done
action.description: Rename the currently selected files, making the filenames lower-case & replacing spaces with underscore

action.name: List filename paths
action.description: List all filenam paths in terminal

action.name: Delete All Empty Folders
action.description: Deletes all empty folders in current directory.

action.name: Edit as root
action.description: Edit file as root in Geany

action.name: Open Thunar as root
action.description: Open Thunar as root

action.name: Mogrify jpg to png in new directory
action.command: D="$(zenity --title="Directory Name" --entry --text="Please enter the directory name")"; if [ ! -d $D ]; then mkdir $D; fi && mogrify -path $D -format png %F
action.description: Mogrify jpg to png in new directory of choice

action.name: Convert image
action.description: Convert the selected files to the user defined graphic format

action.name: Resize images x500 in dir images
action.description: resize pictures in ./images x500 set size in Thunar command

action.name: Resize images dialog
action.description: Resize the selected graphic files

action.name: Resize images exact
action.description: Resize to exact pixel size no aspect ratio enter like: 150x150

action.name: Image link markdown
action.description: Make image reference links for markdown in dir images

action.description: Make a view of 3 images and add labels to them, collect in montage view

action.description: Make a view of 4 images and add labels to them, collect in montage view
